metadata.title: Jose Veliz | Software Developer
metadata.description: Software developer focused on SaaS and web apps for entrepreneurs and SMBs.

hero.description: I build software that drives business growth. Specialized in SaaS solutions and web apps for entrepreneurs and SMBs.

about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: My journey in software began with curiosity about how things work. That curiosity turned into a passion for building solutions that truly help businesses grow.
about.paragraph2: I specialize in working with entrepreneurs and small businesses that need to digitize their operations. I know every dollar counts and you need results, not promises.

items.title: Helsa
items.subtitle: Management system for health clinics and doctors
items.description: All-in-one platform that helped health clinics digitize operations, cutting admin time by 50% and improving patient experience.

items.title: PartySplit
items.subtitle: Expense-splitting app for social events
items.description: Mobile app that simplifies splitting costs among friends during social events, reducing friction and financial conflicts.

items.title: Influencer Inmobiliaria
items.subtitle: Management system for real estate agents
items.description: Platform for real estate agents that optimizes property and client management, boosting sales by 30% with tracking and analytics tools.
